mapper.select: SELECT business_no AS businessNo, avg_star_rate AS avgStarRate, review_cnt AS reviewCnt, store_name AS storeName, store_address AS storeAddress FROM ( SELECT M.business_no, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, store_name, store_address FROM master M JOIN ( SELECT * FROM promotion_board P JOIN premiume_promotion_board PB ON PB.promotion_bno = P.promotion_bno) T ON M.business_no = T.business_no ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7

SELECT business_no AS businessNo, avg_star_rate AS avgStarRate, review_cnt AS reviewCnt, store_name AS storeName, store_address AS storeAddress FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, t_pb.* FROM ( SELECT M.business_no, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, store_name, store_address FROM master M JOIN ( SELECT * FROM promotion_board P JOIN premiume_promotion_board PB ON PB.promotion_bno = P.promotion_bno) T ON M.business_no = T.business_no ORDER BY end_date ) t_pb) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})
